C

convertWaveToFlac(File, File) - Method in class org.ixdhof.speechrecognizer.FlacEncoder
Converts a wave file to a FLAC file(in order to POST the data to Google and retrieve a response)
Sample Rate is 8000 by default
convertWaveToFlac(String, String) - Method in class org.ixdhof.speechrecognizer.FlacEncoder
Converts a wave file to a FLAC file(in order to POST the data to Google and retrieve a response)
Sample Rate is 8000 by default

F

FlacEncoder - Class in org.ixdhof.speechrecognizer
Class that contains methods to encode Wave files to FLAC files THIS IS THANKS TO THE javaFlacEncoder Project created here: http://sourceforge.net/projects/javaflacencoder/
